Skeleton Development - As a supervisor I must be able to get updates on all the status changes via WhatsApp and in app notifications.
UI Integration - As a supervisor I must be able to get updates on all the status changes via WhatsApp and in app notifications.

Skeleton Development - As a supervisor I must be able to see the following tiles on my dashboard:   Escalated requests,  Unassigned Requests,  In - progress Requests, On hold requests  ,Completed Requests
UI Integration - As a supervisor I must be able to see the following tiles on my dashboard:   Escalated requests,  Unassigned Requests,  In - progress Requests, On hold requests  ,Completed Requests
UI Integration - As a supervisor, I must be able to view all my service requests created in RAG indicators

Skeleton Development - As a guest, I must be notified via WhatsApp and in-app notifications about the status of my submitted requests, including updates when the request is marked as ‘In Progress’ and when it is ‘Completed’.

UI Integration - As a guest, I must be notified via WhatsApp and in-app notifications about the status of my submitted requests, including updates when the request is marked as ‘In Progress’ and when it is ‘Completed’.

UI Integration - As a guest I should receive a confirmation when the SR is complete as WhatsApp or in app.
Skeleton Development - As an assigned staff member to a service request, once when the accept is triggered the Service request SLA starts the count down mapped with the task duration.
UI Integration - As an assigned staff member to a service request, once when the accept is triggered the Service request SLA starts the count down mapped with the task duration.
Skeleton Development - As an assigned staff member I must receive a WhatsApp and in-app notification about the assigned service request
UI Integration - As an assigned staff member I must receive a WhatsApp and in-app notification about the assigned service request
UI Integration - As a supervisor I must be able to reassign the assigned staff member
Skeleton Development - As a supervisor, when the guests has submitted a service request then I must be able to get notified via WhatsApp and in app notification of service request submission.
UI Integration - As a supervisor, when the guests has submitted a service request then I must be able to get notified via WhatsApp and in app notification of service request submission.
Skeleton Development - As a guest, once I have submitted a service request, I must receive an in-app notification confirming the request submission along with the generated Job ID
UI Integration - As a guest, once I have submitted a service request, I must receive an in-app notification confirming the request submission along with the generated Job ID
Skeleton Development - As a guest, I should receive confirmation of my SR with a unique job ID number
UI Integration - As a guest, I should receive confirmation of my SR with a unique job ID number
UI Integration - As a guest when I login  my dashboard should have create Service request button, My Service Requests tile and Notification Tile.
Skeleton Development - As a guest when I login  my dashboard should have create Service request button, My Service Requests tile and Notification Tile.

UI Integration - As a guest, I must be able to view all my submitted service requests under a “My Service Requests” section, with RAG (Red, Amber, Green) indicators clearly showing the current status of each request (e.g., In Progress, Completed, Pending)
UI Integration - As an assigned staff member to a service request I must be able to 'accept' and status change to 'in progress' to 'complete' the service request
UI Integration - As a supervisor I would be able to assign the ticket to a staff
UI Integration - As a supervisor, I must be able to see newly submitted guest service requests in my dashboard assigned to the respective Supervisor group

UI Integration - As a guest when I login  my dashboard should have create Service request button and My Service Requests tile.
